thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Blake Shelton Talks Valentine's Day Plans With Gwen Stefani

author: Elisa Osegueda
title: EXCLUSIVE: Blake Shelton Talks Valentine's Day Plans With Gwen Stefani

persons.name: gwen stefani gushes over blake shelton

organizations.name: her sons throw epic dance party

text: EXCLUSIVE: Blake Shelton Talks Valentine's Day Plans With Gwen Stefani by Elisa Osegueda 8:34   Photo: Getty Images Blake Shelton has a lot to celebrate! The 41-year-old singer took home two big awards at the 43rd   on Wednesday, and there to help him celebrate was his girlfriend, Gwen Stefani. WATCH: Gwen Stefani Gushes Over Blake Shelton: ‘How Are You Real?’ "This is incredible. Two  , this is an honor," Shelton told ET's Carly Steel backstage, following his acceptance speech. The "She's Got a Way With Words" singer won Best Album and Favorite Country Male Singer. While onstage, Shelton thanked his fans and gave a quick shout-out to Stefani, calling her the "hottest date here tonight." Watch @VictoriaJustice present @blakeshelton with his #PCAs for “Favorite Male Country Artist” and “Favorite Album” pic.twitter.com/rdyM40mSNm — People's Choice (@peopleschoice) January 19, 2017 "This means everything," Shelton explained. "I mean, I've been fortunate in my career to have some success and anything that happens is because the fans react to it, but to be put up against the other artists and come out with one of these is incredible because everybody in those categories, they're all so talented and successful and the fact that the fans this year for whatever reason thought I'm the guy, I'll never forget it. It's a really big deal to me." WATCH: Blake Shelton, Gwen Stefani and Her Sons Throw Epic Dance Party -- Watch Their Amazing Moves! Shelton also teased what he has in store for Stefani on Valentine's Day. "I think she knows it's going to be Valentine's Day, so I can't really surprise her with that," he joked. "No, I'm kidding. I don't know. I'm one of those guys that's always last minute, like, 'Oh dammit. It's here, it's here!' Get some flowers or something. I'm not good at planning surprises when it comes to Valentine's Day, but we'll definitely celebrate." "I mean, I won't forget totally," he continued. "I'll just forget until the last minute." For more on the happy couple, watch the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
